A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Okay\, what in the holy jesus fudgecakes is the internet thin-- Okay. I won't disrespect everyone else's opinions\, but this is my personal favorite star wars movie! I mean\, yes\, luke dies\, but in a really good scene. And the movie worked--- It clicked. The only real reason the internet went bezerk is because a bunch of crazy fanboys complained that since their hero died\, this was 'The worst movie ever.' Well they're wrong.\nI give this 5 stars.
